#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int test;
	cin>>test;
	while(test--)
	{
	int h1,m1,s1,h2,m2,s2;
	cin>>h1>>m1>>s1;
	cin>>h2>>m2>>s2;
	int time = (h2-h1)*3600 + (m2-m1)*60 + (s2-s1);
	while(time>=400)
	{ time = time-400;
	}
	if(time>=0&&time<=99) cout<<"S"<<endl;
	else if(time>99&&time<=199) cout<<"C"<<endl;
	else if(time>199 && time<=299) cout<<"S"<<endl;
	else if(time>299 && time<=399) cout<<"C"<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
